2.title: Observer
2.desc:
Can view and interact (loot/buy/sell) with the sheet.
The possible interactions depend on the sheet's type and settings.

3.title: Owner
3.desc: Can view the sheet and freely modify the inventory of the sheet's actor.

lootsheettype.title: Sheet type
lootsheettype.content: <dl><dt>Loot</dt><dd>Allows for distribution of coins across players</dd><dt>Merchant</dt><dd>Allows players to purchase items directly from the sheet.</dd></dl>

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.content: ⚠️ Ensure a character is selected for the players via the 'Player configuration'. So they are displayed here. ⚠️

permissions_individual.title: Individual permissions
permissions_individual.content: 🔁 Click on a character to to cycle the players permission. Hover to see information.

buyItem.name: Buy item
buyItem.hint: Allow players to buy items from the merchant sheet?

chatGracePeriod.name: Chat grace period (in seconds)
chatGracePeriod.hint: When updating the chat messages after this grace period. The module will create a new message instead of updating the old one.

colorRarity.name: Colorize rarity?
colorRarity.hint: Use slight color indication to show rarity? (Be aware that this might affect colorblind players)

convertCurrency.name: Convert currency
convertCurrency.hint: Convert currency to the highest denomination possible after a purchase. (e.g. gp to pp)

fallbackCurrencyFormula.name: Default currency formula
fallbackCurrencyFormula.hint: Formula to calculate the currency if no other formula was picked up from the actor or seeder settings. (e.g. '1d6[gp], 2d6[sp], 3d6[cp]')

filterNaturalWeapons.name: Filter natural weapons
filterNaturalWeapons.hint: Filter natural weapons from the inventory?

distributeCurrency.name: Distribute currency
distributeCurrency.hint: Allow players to split currency between the party members?

generateChatMessages.name: Chat messages
generateChatMessages.hint: Generate chat messages when players take, buy or sell items.

lootAll.name: Loot all
lootAll.hint: Allow a player to take all items from a sheet at once?

includeCurrencyWeight.name: Include currency weight
includeCurrencyWeight.hint: Include the weight of currency in a sheet's total weight calculations?

lootCurrency.name: Loot currency
lootCurrency.hint: Allow a player to take all currency from a sheet at once?

lootItem.name: Looting
lootItem.hint: Allow players to loot items from a sheet?

maxPriceIncrease.name: Maximum price increase
maxPriceIncrease.hint: Maximum price increase for the merchant sheet. (e.g. 200% = 100gp -> 200gp)

reduceUpdateVerbosity.name: Reduce update verbosity
reduceUpdateVerbosity.hint: No notifications will be created every time an item is added to the inventory.

showStackWeight.name: Show stack weight
showStackWeight.hint: Show the weight of the entire stack next to an item's individual weight.

stackBuyConfirm.name: Confirm purchase of item stacks
stackBuyConfirm.hint: Ask for confirmation before purchasing a stack of items?

sheetUpdate.name: Force sheet update
sheetUpdate.hint: This setting will try to send a signal to players when something changes in the sheet. Telling their FoundryVTT client to rerender the sheet.

tradeItems.name: Trading
tradeItems.hint: Allow players to trade items with the sheet.

autoSeedTokens.name: Auto seeding
autoSeedTokens.hint: Automatically seed (non linked) npc tokens when dropped on the map. (If any table is linked/found for the token actor.)

adjustCurrencyWithCR.name: Adjust currency with CR
adjustCurrencyWithCR.hint: Currency will be slightly adjusted by the CR (rollFormula + rounding up the creatures CR value).

creatureTypeFallbacks.name: Creature type fallbacks
creatureTypeFallbacks.hint: Fallback rolltables to use if no rolltable is assigned to the actor but the actor macthes this creature type.

lootCurrencyDefault.name: Currency default formula
lootCurrencyDefault.hint: Formula to use  for loot currency generation. (e.g. 1d4[gp], 1d20[sp], 1d50[cp])

fallbackRolltable.name: Seeder default rolltable
fallbackRolltable.label: A default rolltable used by the seeder for (not skipped) tokens if no rolltable is found on/for the actor.

fallbackShopQty.name: Default shop quantity
fallbackShopQty.hint: Default shop quantity to use if no shop quantity is assigned to the actor. (e.g. 1d6)

fallbackItemQty.name: Default item quantity
fallbackItemQty.hint: Default item quantity to use if no quantity is assigned to the actor. (e.g. 1d6)

fallbackItemQtyLimit.name: Default item quantity maximum
fallbackItemQtyLimit.hint: Default item quantity maxmimum to use if no maxmimum quantity is assigned to the actor. (e.g. 2d20 || 10)

generateCurrency.name: Generate currency
generateCurrency.hint: Generate currency during automatic item seeding.

useRulesets.name: Use filter rulesets
useRulesets.hint: Custom rules to test against a token actor. E.g. if tokens actor matches the rules, a rolltable will be used instead of non or a default rolltable.

useSkiplist.name: Use skiplist
useSkiplist.hint: Use the skiplist to ignore tokens with certain types during auto seeding.

addInterfaceButtons.name: Add interface buttons
addInterfaceButtons.hint: Adds a button to the left hand side to add loot to a sheet. Adds a button to the token hud to change the permissions to observers.

useBetterRolltables.name: Use better rolltables
useBetterRolltables.hint: If installed make use of better rolltables to update Inventory?
